articles.title: Prince Andrew's effort to toss sex assault lawsuit hits a roadblock - CBC News
articles.description: A judge was mostly dismissive Tuesday of oral arguments by a lawyer for Prince Andrew who wants to win fast rejection of a lawsuit alleging that the prince two decades ago sexually assaulted a 17-year-old American who was trafficked by Jeffrey Epstein.

articles.author: Eric Garcia
articles.title: Record 4.5 million ‘Great Resignation’ workers quit their jobs in November – what this means for Biden - The Independent
articles.description: A record 4.5 million American workers quit their jobs in the month of November, according to the US Bureau of Labor Statistics, which matched the series-high number of quit rates in September.
articles.content:

articles.title: US records over a million cases in one day - eNCA
articles.description: Despite the record numbers, many Americans are still reluctant to get Covid-19 vaccine booster shots.
articles.content:
NEW YORK - The Omicron Covid-19 variant is wreaking havoc in the US.
Data from Johns Hopkins University reveals the country recorded over a million infections on Monday.
